title: Step 1 - Assess the Use Case
summary: Identify the intended purpose for synthetic health data and confirm that synthetic data is the right approach. Evaluate ethical, legal and governance alignment before proceeding.
checklist: Define the proposed purpose for using synthetic data.
Check alignment with organisational policy and legal frameworks.
Assess whether synthetic data is necessary or alternative methods could achieve the goal.
Document benefits, potential impacts and intended outcomes.
If complex or novel, escalate to a governance committee for review.
